title: How to Do It: Is What I Just Did Really “Cheating” on My Boyfriend?
description:
This week, Stoya and Rich answer a letter from a letter writer who wonders if what she just did counts as cheating. Then they hear from a man who wonders how to get his husband to agree to indulge his new desire in bed.
